newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Petron lowers unleaded gasoline price.
newsitem.headline: Petron lowers unleaded gasoline price.

text.p: Philippine oil refiner Petron Corp said on Friday it has reduced the price of unleaded premium gasoline by 20 centavos to 9.9365 pesos per litre.
Petron spokesman Malou Erni told Reuters the price cut took effect on July 2 as a result of lower Singapore Posted Prices. Other prices of Petron's petroleum products remained the same.
Rival oil refiner Pilipinas Shell Petroleum Corp on Thursday announced a similar 20 centavo reduction in its unleaded gasoline price effective July 2.
